attributes.review: Hello I was told if I downloaded this app I’d have 3 extra dollars and a 20 pack of bubblegum but when I checked my purse it wasn’t there. So this uneducated man lied and told me he would give me gum so I tried to support him and this is what he does. I am a very emotional person and I just wanted to say U CANT BAN TIKTOK DAAAANG
attributes.title: TRASHHHHHHH

attributes.review: When I first downloaded it kept glitching and shutting down my phone??? It said that the app was very organized and had all these plans but I haven't seen a single good one put into action??? Anyways vote blue 2020 ✨
attributes.title: It’s not what is says it is

attributes.review: This app doesn’t work and kept making my phone crash.  It uses outdated and bad software and is very hard to use. Additionally it sends me copious amounts of notifications for no reason and is very annoying. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I was genuinely interested in getting Mr Presidents app as a proud American. However every time I went into the app it would glitch completely. The app also smelled horrible like rapists and pedophiles. I really hope the good folks at Apple can help fix this. God Bless America!
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: I have supported trump since 2016. However, this app is really bad. The format is awful and non navigate-able. And it was also really laggy and buggy. 0/10 would not recommend
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: He is super racist and his app is literally ruining the only thing we can do right now I downloaded the app to support him but all it did was ruin the pictures on my wall and put holes in my walls and doors I guess the orange was just to strong cause it ruined my eyesight
